speaker: Doctor
text: Hi, I see we don't have much information on your medical history. Can you tell me about any medications you're currently taking?

speaker: Patient
text: Sure, I'm taking a birth control pill, but I can't remember the name right now.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's okay. Do you know if you've had any side effects from it?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, but sometimes I feel a bit nauseous.

speaker: Doctor
text: Alright, we can look into that. Are you taking any other medications or supplements?
